## replace() function

Replace a value inside some object with another value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function replace(inObj: any, path: string, value: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inObj | any | Object within which to make the replacement. |
|  path | string | Path to the value to replace. Supports dotted and bracket notation. Eg "foo" means a value with key <code>foo</code> in the root. "foo.bar" means a value with key <code>bar</code> inside a value with key <code>foo</code>. "foo\[1\]" means the object at index 1 inside a value with key <code>foo</code>. |
|  value | any | Value to replace the original value with. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
